v8:item.v8:content: Setup of data synchronization with web application
Information about data synchronization with the <Correspondent description>
We recommend you to back up the infobase before the data synchronization setup.
Data analysis in progress. This can take several minutes. Please wait...
Mapping of identical data items (step 2 of 4)

Accounting is maintained in both applications, so you should map the data. This will help to avoid creation of catalog item duplicates that were independently introduced in both applications. For example, catalog items with identical descriptions. During mapping you can specify data items that are identical in both applications.
All data is mapped. Make sure that automatic data mapping is executed correctly.
Flag shows whether there are unmapped data items
Synchronization in progress. This can take several minutes. Please wait...
The values for the automatic filling of attributes when data is received in this application.
The values for the automatic filling of attributes when data is received in the second application.
Settings for adding documents to accouting in the propper way (step 4 of 4)
Settings saving in progress. Please wait...
Data synchronization setup is completed successfully

Data sinchronization between applications in progress. You can continue using the application, without waiting for the synchronization completion. Data will be synchronized automatically every 15 minutes.
Click Done to finish operation with the wizard.
Event log message text of data synchronization setup
Correspondent infobase node default values available
Correspondent infobase default value setup form
User answered yes to question about mapping
